rules_text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Create a Clue token. If you control three or more artifacts, you may draw a card instead.
flavor_text:
[i]“If you need proof of L'Or, look no further. That creature is far too majestic for our murky seas.”
—Captain Rosie Wright[/i]
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
